title: Spirit (Keyword)
content:
Cards with the spirit keyword represent the spirits of nature and the ancestors who dwell, unseen by most, in the Valley. By journeying to the spirit realm, Spirit Speakers are able to communicate with these interdimensional beings and ask for their assistance with the task at hand.

You cannot interact with cards with the spirit keyword with any common test.

Note: Other tests can still interact with spirits as normal.

Only attachments with the Spiritual trait can be attached to cards with the spirit keyword.
